content.description: Sit start under roof, below the obvious arete. Crank roof and climb arete to top out.

climbs.name: Set the controls for the heart of the Sun

content.description: Fun and solid moves. Sharp right hand
content.location: Start on a left hand incut and right hand crimp knob about a foot above the roof and left of the Thighmaster arete, pull on and pull to sharp knob, topout.

content.description: Squat start at the lip of the boulder, work your hands and feet up and mantel to top it.
content.location: It’s on the opposite side of Thighmaster

content.description: Sit start with right hand on vampire fang crimp and your choice of left hand (slopey edge or shark tooth crimp) plaster feet and make one move to the lip and top it out.   Surprisingly fun for its size!
content.location: It’s on the opposite side of Thighmaster

content.description: Just left of the starting hold for The Thighmaster. Start on a good right hand undercling and a left hand sloping pinch. Climb directly up the face to the left of the arete by making a move to a big blocky pinch at the lip and work up the face out of the roof using good holds and the arete out to the right until you find yourself standing at the top of the boulder. You could also just start the boulder from the actual Thighmaster starting jug and the boulder would climb quite similarly as long as you follow the same line, but the other start is slightly lower into the roof making it a lower start.
content.location: Route is found on the roof of the Pink Boulder left of The Thighmaster.

content.description: Boulder by the tangerine wall that holds some good problems.
